value: Write a function named showNumbers() which takes 1 argument named limit and program starts from o to limit and checks the numbers in between 0 to limit and prints whether the number is Even or odd like the below.

title: solution
value:
function showNumbers(limit){
for(i=0;i<=limit;i++){
if(i%2 ===0){
console.log(i," - Even");
}
else{
console.log(i," - Odd");
}
}
}
showNumbers(3);
